类 ShortestPath

  • java.lang.Object
    • ShortestPath

  • public class ShortestPath
extends java.lang.Object
    Find all shortest path between two node in the Directed graph.
    作者:
    HanYue

      static java.lang.Integer calcPathDistance(Graph G, java.lang.String word1, java.lang.String word2)
      calculate all distance from node word1 to word2 without path.
      static java.util.List<java.lang.String> calcShortestPath(Graph G, java.lang.String word1, java.lang.String word2)
      calculate all shortest path from node word1 to word2.

    • 方法详细资料

      • calcShortestPath

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> calcShortestPath(Graph G,
                                                                java.lang.String word1,
                                                                java.lang.String word2)
        calculate all shortest path from node word1 to word2.
        参数:
        G - Graph
        word1 - String
        word2 - String
        返回:
        a list of all shortest path. each path is like this
        A->B->C

      • calcPathDistance

        public static java.lang.Integer calcPathDistance(Graph G,
                                                 java.lang.String word1,
                                                 java.lang.String word2)
        calculate all distance from node word1 to word2 without path.
        参数:
        G - Graph
        word1 - String
        word2 - String
        返回:
        Integer distance
